text: A Man at His Place () is a 1972 Soviet drama movie directed by Aleksey Sakharov.Мединский поздравил Владимира Меньшова с юбилеемЧеловек на своем месте It stars Vladimir Menshov, Anastasiya Vertinskaya, and Armen Dzhigarkhanyan. == Actors == * Vladimir Menshov as Semyon Bobrov * Anastasiya Vertinskaya * Armen Dzhigarkhanyan * Lev Durov * Viktor Avdyushko * Nina Menshikova * Georgi Burkov == References == ==Other websites== * Category:Soviet movies Category:1972 drama movies Category:Russian drama movies Category:Movies directed by Aleksey Sakharov
title: A Man at His Place
